TEXT: A #rvengeful #rspirit dwells here. If you slay it, you too can #gmove #gon from your humble #ybeginnings. NL NL You #rcannot #rRest. Fights have additional #rintangible #rspirits giving special #ycard #yrewards. NL Shops are #yspirit-themed, and the #rElite can #gremove #gstarter #gcards.
